00964 
00965    if ((addresses = ast_calloc(MAX_BACKTRACE_FRAMES, sizeof(*addresses)))) {
00966       count = backtrace(addresses, MAX_BACKTRACE_FRAMES);
00967       if ((strings = backtrace_symbols(addresses, count))) {
00968          if (option_debug)
00969             ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Got %d backtrace record%c\n", count, count != 1 ? 's' : ' ');
00970          for (i=0; i < count ; i++) {
00971             if (option_debug)
00972                ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "#%d: [%08X] %s\n", i, (unsigned int)addresses[i], strings[i]);
00973          }
00974          free(strings);
00975       } else {
00976          if (option_debug)
00977             ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Could not allocate memory for backtrace\n");

00868    struct logmsg *logmsg = NULL;
00869    struct ast_str *buf = NULL;
00870    struct tm tm;
00871    time_t t;
00872    int res = 0;
00873    va_list ap;
00874 
00875    if (!(buf = ast_str_thread_get(&log_buf, LOG_BUF_INIT_SIZE)))
00876       return;
00877 
00878    if (AST_LIST_EMPTY(&logchannels)) {
00879       /*
00880        * we don't have the logger chain configured yet,
00881        * so just log to stdout
00882        */
00883       if (level != __LOG_VERBOSE) {
00884          int res;
00885          va_start(ap, fmt);
00886          res = ast_str_set_va(&buf, BUFSIZ, fmt, ap); /* XXX BUFSIZ ? */
00887          va_end(ap);
00888          if (res != AST_DYNSTR_BUILD_FAILED) {
00889             term_filter_escapes(buf->str);
00890             fputs(buf->str, stdout);
00891          }
00892       }
00893       return;
00894    }
00895    
00896    /* don't display LOG_DEBUG messages unless option_verbose _or_ option_debug
00897       are non-zero; LOG_DEBUG messages can still be displayed if option_debug
00898       is zero, if option_verbose is non-zero (this allows for 'level zero'
00899       LOG_DEBUG messages to be displayed, if the logmask on any channel
00900       allows it)
00901    */
00902    if (!option_verbose && !option_debug && (level == __LOG_DEBUG))
00903       return;
00904 
00905    /* Ignore anything that never gets logged anywhere */
00906    if (!(global_logmask & (1 << level)))
00907       return;
00908    
00909    /* Ignore anything other than the currently debugged file if there is one */
00910    if ((level == __LOG_DEBUG) && !ast_strlen_zero(debug_filename) && strcasecmp(debug_filename, file))
00911       return;
00912 
00913    /* Build string */
00914    va_start(ap, fmt);
00915    res = ast_str_set_va(&buf, BUFSIZ, fmt, ap);
00916    va_end(ap);
00917 
00918    /* If the build failed, then abort and free this structure */
00919    if (res == AST_DYNSTR_BUILD_FAILED)
00920       return;
00921 
00922    /* Create a new logging message */
00923    if (!(logmsg = ast_calloc(1, sizeof(*logmsg) + res + 1)))
00924       return;
00925    
00926    /* Copy string over */
00927    strcpy(logmsg->str, buf->str);
00928 
00929    /* Set type to be normal */
00930    logmsg->type = LOGMSG_NORMAL;
00931 
00932    /* Create our date/time */
00933    time(&t);
00934    localtime_r(&t, &tm);
00935    strftime(logmsg->date, sizeof(logmsg->date), dateformat, &tm);
00936 
00937    /* Copy over data */
00938    logmsg->level = level;
00939    logmsg->file = file;
00940    logmsg->line = line;
00941    logmsg->function = function;
00942 
00943    /* If the logger thread is active, append it to the tail end of the list - otherwise skip that step */
00944    if (logthread != AST_PTHREADT_NULL) {
00945       AST_LIST_LOCK(&logmsgs);
00946       AST_LIST_INSERT_TAIL(&logmsgs, logmsg, list);
00947       ast_cond_signal(&logcond);
00948       AST_LIST_UNLOCK(&logmsgs);
00949    } else {
00950       logger_print_normal(logmsg);
00951       free(logmsg);
00952    }
00953 
00954    return;
00955 }
